Package game.items

Class SpecialItem

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.items.SpecialItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable, TradeableItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
PowerStar, SuperMushroom
public class SpecialItem
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
implements TradeableItem
Class of Special items that implements interface TradeableItem Items that give the consumer special capabilities
Version:
2.0 29/4/2022
Author:
Jastej Gill
